components.planningdetails

Class AddingWaypointState

  • java.lang.Object
    • components.planningdetails.PlanningDetailsState
      • components.planningdetails.AddingWaypointState
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IPlanningDetailsState

    public class AddingWaypointState
extends PlanningDetailsState
    The AddingWaypointState state is used when the user is adding a new waypoint and is inputting the delivery duration and the time constraints (it is the state that comes after he choose an address with the map).

      • Fields inherited from class components.planningdetails.PlanningDetailsState

    • Constructor Detail

      • AddingWaypointState

        public AddingWaypointState(@NotNull
                           PlanningDetails planningDetails,
                           int index,
                           @NotNull
                           Intersection intersection)
        Parameters:
        planningDetails - The component to attach to this state.
        index - The index (order in the planning) where to insert the waypoint once it is created.
        intersection - The address where the user wants to add the new waypoint.

    • Method Detail

      • refreshView

        public void refreshView()
        This method applies the view corresponding to the AddingWaypointState state. The "add" and "remove" butonns of the existing waypoints are disabled. The form is located at the position where the new waypoint would be once created.
        Specified by:
        refreshView in interface IPlanningDetailsState
        Overrides:
        refreshView in class PlanningDetailsState

      • onSaveNewWaypoint

        @NotNull
public IPlanningDetailsState onSaveNewWaypoint(@NotNull
                                                        SaveDeliveryAddress event)
        Handle the "save" user action.

        It simply adds the newly created waypoint to the planning at the chosen index.

        Specified by:
        onSaveNewWaypoint in interface IPlanningDetailsState
        Overrides:
        onSaveNewWaypoint in class PlanningDetailsState
        Parameters:
        event - An object representing the saveDeliveryAddress user action.
        Returns:
        A instance of DefaultState for this component.

      • onCancelAddWaypointAction

        @NotNull
public IPlanningDetailsState onCancelAddWaypointAction(@NotNull
                                                                CancelAddWaypointAction action)
        Restore the default state upon cancellation.

        There is no button in GUI to trigger this action currently.

        Specified by:
        onCancelAddWaypointAction in interface IPlanningDetailsState
        Overrides:
        onCancelAddWaypointAction in class PlanningDetailsState
        Parameters:
        action - The object representing the user action.
        Returns:
        A DefaultState state for the component.
